name: Modern Home Design
description: Have you ever dream of becoming a house builder who can also do interior design of your dream home building? So, Welcome you in your favorite house construction games & enchanted home design games. Become a home builder of your dream house & machine world and perform different duties like to construct a house building, interior design, home  etc. unseen in other house building games & interior design games. Now start your journey of house construction like a house builder and you have to need different construction equipment like heavy excavator, loader truck, excavator crane, dumper truck for build a house & home design 3d.
